articles.title: Kim Jong Un Provides Field Guidance to Paektusan Hero Youth Power Station No. 3
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Provides Field Guidance to Paektusan Hero Youth Power Station No. 3
Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, provided field guidance to the Paektusan Hero Youth Power Station No. 3 successfully completed as a gift of loyalty which young people, masters of the youth power, presented to the 7th Congress of the WPK.
					 He shook hands with commanding officers one by one, praising them for having done a lot of work.
					
					 Our reliable young people of Mt. Paektu have completed the project in the run-up to the congress of the party, thus carrying out the order given by me four months ahead of schedule, he said, adding that another fresh legendary tale about youth was created in the wake of last year in the land of Mt. Paektu where the Juche revolution started.
					
					 He looked round the Exhibition of the Paektusan Hero Young People's Feats.
					
					 Looking at exhibits one by one there, he said that merely watching the Paektusan Hero Youth Power Station brings the image of leader Kim Jong Il to my mind. The completion of the power station No. 3 made it possible to implement his behest, he stressed. 
					
					 He noted with deep emotion that what pleased him was the appearance of young people as heroes of the times and giants who performed heroic feats as desired by Kim Jong Il rather than the creation of the capability to solve the problem of electricity in Samjiyon County.
					
					 In order to know how great the WPK's idea of attaching importance to the youth is and how rosy the future of the youth power is, everybody should visit the Paektusan Hero Youth Power Station, he said, emphasizing that the power station is not only an electricity-generating base but also a center for education eloquently proving the validity and vitality of the party's idea of attaching importance to the youth and in what perseverance our young people created the fresh spirit of the times.
					
					 Saying that a huge man-made lake appeared in the land of Mt. Paektu after the construction of the dam of the Paektusan Hero Youth Power Station No. 1, he named the lake the "Paektu Hero Youth Lake".
					
					 He went round the Paektusan Hero Youth Power Station No. 3.
					
					 By completing the Paektusan Hero Youth Power Stations Nos. 1, 2 and 3 in a matter of a year, the iron fists of the heroic youth which have grown strong under the loving care of the party hit hard the heads of the U.S. imperialists and their followers hell-bent on their moves to ratchet up sanctions against the DPRK and stifle it on the principle of self-reliance and self-development.
					
					 The revolutionary soldier spirit and Kanggye spirit were created in the period of the Arduous March, forced march and the Paektusan hero youth spirit was done in the present difficult period, a clear proof of the just leadership of the great leaders and the WPK that trained young people as reserves, advancing group and wing of the party as required by the developing revolution assuming protracted nature from the very day the party was founded, he noted.
					
					 The completion of the power station proved once again that party's determination precisely means a reality and practice, young Koreans are creditably playing a vanguard role in translating the party's determination into reality and their strength is inexhaustible, indeed, he said, adding that he felt irrepressible urge to meet all of them and they did a lot of work. He requested the commanding officers to convey his wish for their good health to them.
					
					 He gave an instruction to hold with splendor a ceremony of commissioning the power station to strikingly demonstrate the indomitable mental power and spirit of young Koreans. He gave on the spot an instruction related to the ceremony and personally assigned a new militant duty to be fulfilled by the Paektusan Hero Youth Shock Brigade.
					
					 He was accompanied by Secretary Choe Ryong Hae, Department Director Ri Il Hwan and Vice Department Director Jo Yong Won of the WPK Central Committee.

articles.title: DPRK FM Delivers Speech at UN Senior Forum
articles.content:
DPRK FM Delivers Speech at UN Senior Forum
Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- Ri Su Yong, foreign minister of the DPRK, made a speech at the UN Senior Forum for Sustainable Development Goal held at the UN Headquarters on April 21.
					 Noting that the Sustainable Development Goal is an action program of the international community, which pledges to eliminate social inequality and poverty on a global scale, give full rein to human dignity and creative ability and guarantee affluent lives not only to our generation but to the coming generations, he went on:
					
					 The Democratic People's Republic of Korea considers the goals of the SDG to be in line with its policy for the construction of the thriving socialist nation. We have therefore expressed our approval of it. 
					
					 Being a socialist state centered on the people, the DPRK serves the people and strives to provide them with more fulfilling and civilized life.
					
					 Thanks to the universal 12-year free compulsory educational system and learning-while-working educational system in our country, everyone can study to their hearts' content, and the universal health care system brings medical care within their reach free of charge, regardless of sex, age, occupation and location.
					
					 The people are provided with housing, free of charge, as well as jobs for those with abilities; they are not familiar with the word "tax" and enjoy such social benefits as paid leaves, rest and recuperation, all at state expenses.
					
					 Our country has a good prospect for sustainable development.
					
					 The government of the DPRK has set solving the food issue as the priority task for improving the people's livelihood; it actively introduces scientific farming methods and speeds up the comprehensive mechanization of agriculture to double the grain production by 2030.
					
					 Major production bases, educational and cultural facilities and dwelling houses of highest level are sprouting up at maximum speed; newly-built cultural and recreation facilities for the people and coming generations add to their laughter of happiness all around the country.
					
					 The DPRK government has declared reforestation as a war to tame the nature, whereby it builds modern tree nurseries to put sapling production on a scientific, industrial and intensive footing; it simultaneously undertakes afforestation and forest protection, so as to afforest or reforest 1.67million hectares of mountainous areas by 2024.
					
					 The land development has proceeded in scientific and prospective way to provide people with more civilized and secure ground for life, thereby setting up a firm guarantee to greatly diminish human and economic losses caused by natural disasters by 2030.
					
					 The DPRK hold fast to the policy of attaching importance to science and technology as its strategic line. It will steadily increase state investment to science research and increase its level of dependence on domestic raw materials, resources and equipment so as to foster its independent development capacity.
					
					 The Sustainable Development Goal calls for full respect for territorial integrity and political independence of all countries, ensuring their complete and permanent exercise of sovereignty in so far as the wealth, natural resources and economic activities are concerned; it also solemnly and strongly urges to prohibit unilateral economic, financial and commercial measures in violation of international laws and the UN Charter. 
					
					 Sustainable development in our country is going through the most adverse conditions due to the outside forces.
					
					 At this very moment, on the Korean peninsula, the largest-ever nuclear war exercise, where armed troops numbering more than 300 000 along with all the nuclear assets of the U.S. are mobilized, is underway, in the most frantic manner.
					
					 The nuclear war exercise by the U.S. against the DPRK has been staged in uninterrupted succession since the 1950s till today. 
					
					 The DPRK government had sought to get rid of the nuclear threat from the U.S. by means of talks and the rule of international law, but all in vain.    
					
					 The last choice we are left with is to respond nukes in kind. 
					
					 It is none other than the U.S. that has compelled the DPRK to possess nukes; it is the U.S. nuclear threat that fueled the DPRK's strengthening of nuclear force.
					
					 The U.S., the only one that actually used nuclear weapons and the major party to the nuclear issue on the Korean peninsula, still has the face to make an issue of the DPRK's development of self-defensive nuclear deterrence and satellite launches, adopting UNSC "resolutions on sanctions" against the DPRK. This is the height of tyranny and wickedness.
					
					 The DPRK's hydrogen bomb test is a measure of self-defence to possess nuclear deterrence with the aim of defending country's sovereignty and nation's right to existence from the aggressive hostile policy of the U.S. and its ever-increasing nuclear threat.
					
					 As for the DPRK's satellite launch, it is an exercise of a legitimate right by a sovereign state recognized by international law.
					
					 If an issue was to be made with the DPRK's possession of nukes which is aimed at defending itself from the nuclear threat by the U.S., we should begin by holding the U.S. accountable for being the very first to possess nukes and for being the only one that actually used it. The same logic applies to the issue of the DPRK's satellite launch; the countries that have launched satellites so far including the U.S. should all be taken issue with.
					
					 The U.S. invoked the UNSC to impose sanctions on the DPRK by distorting its self-defensive measures and peaceful development of space as a "threat" to world peace and a "provocation" against humankind's security. This in itself is a wanton violation of international law and the UN Charter and an open challenge to the implementation of the SDG.
					
					 The U.S. has imposed its own heinous sanctions on the DPRK to fill any gaps in the UN sanctions and they are also forcing other countries to cut off all normal trades with it. They are also employing gross and childish methods to hamper the DPRK's economic activities by instigating Japan and south Korea.
					
					 The attempts of the U.S. to stifle the DPRK through nuclear threat and economic blockade are nothing but an expression of their utter ignorance.
					
					 The U.S. will never understand the DPRK's Juche philosophy which is based on the indomitable spirit of rising stronger and sturdier at tougher sanctions and blockades.
					
					 No matter how tough or tight the U.S. sanctions and blockades are, the people of the DPRK will brave through all hardships and difficulties by their own strength upholding the banner of self-development.
					
					 One who laughs at last laughs the best, the victory belongs to us; this is the political will of the respected Comrade Kim Jong Un, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, and the belief and mettle that filled the hearts of our people.
					
					 The people of the DPRK are confident about their victory and they will make the U.S. fully pay the price for having checked their sustainable development at any time in the future.
					
					 The gravity of the U.S. moves to impose sanctions on the DPRK and stifle it lies in that the DPRK is the target of the sanctions and blockades today, but tomorrow all the countries that stand up to the U.S. arbitrary and highhanded practices shall fall victim to the sanctions and blockades.
					
					 We cannot expect the achievement of the SDGs which are meant to improve the well-being of humanity unless we put an end to the arbitrary and highhanded practices of applying unilateral standards and values to regard other countries' political systems hostile and putting political, military and economic pressure upon those countries.
					
					 The UNSC which is being reduced into a tool of the U.S. in enforcing nuclear war and sanctions against the DPRK and jeopardizing the world peace and security should be reformed without delay to quit being a plaything of the U.S.
					
					 On this sacred stage of UN, I strongly urge the U.S. to immediately quit all kinds of nuclear threats and moves for sanctions against the DPRK and withdraw its anachronistic hostile policy towards it.
					
					 At the same time, I reaffirm the commitment of the DPRK to the international efforts towards achieving the SDGs despite the grave situation on the Korean peninsula.

articles.title: Letter to Kim Jong Un from Participants in Asian Regional Internet Seminar on Juche Idea
articles.content:
Letter to Kim Jong Un from Participants in Asian Regional Internet Seminar on Juche Idea
Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- Marshal Kim Jong Un received a letter on April 13 from C. P. Mainali, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Nepal (Marxist-Leninist) who doubles as deputy prime minister and minister of Women, Children and Social Welfare, and Manju Ratna Sakya, deputy director general of the Asian Regional Institute of the Juche Idea who doubles as chairman of the Nepal Journalist Association, on behalf of the participants in the Asian regional internet seminar on the Juche idea.
					 The letter said that the participants in the seminar lauded the immortal exploits performed by President Kim Il Sung, the revolutionary career of leader Kim Jong Il and the validity and vitality of the Juche idea.
					
					 The human history records many great persons but it does not know such great men as Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il who have been praised and revered by all people for decades, it noted, adding:
					
					 Their revolutionary idea and undying feats have been reliably carried forward under the wise guidance of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The letter expressed conviction that the Korean people would foil all the moves of the U.S. imperialists and their followers to isolate, stifle and blockade the DPRK and work fresh miracles to glorify the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea as one of victors under the leadership of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Asian Regional Internet Seminar on Juche Idea Held
articles.content:
Asian Regional Internet Seminar on Juche Idea Held
Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- An Asian regional internet seminar on the Juche idea took place on April 13 to mark the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Displayed on the front wall of the venue of the seminar in Katmandu were portraits of smiling Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Also on display were photos dealing with exploits of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also displayed there were their works, and books and photos introducing the struggle of the servicepersons and people of the DPRK and its reality.
					
					 The participants laid bouquets before the portraits of smiling Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and paid tribute to them.
					
					 They included C. P. Mainali, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Nepal (Marxist-Leninist) who doubles as deputy prime minister and minister of Women, Children and Social Welfare, Manju Ratna Sakya, deputy director general of the Asian Regional Institute of the Juche Idea who doubles as chairman of the Nepal Journalist Association, and other personages of Nepal, delegates of Juche idea study organizations and figures of the Asian Regional Institute of the Juche Idea.
					
					 Manju Ratna Sakya in a report praised Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il as iron-willed commanders and peerlessly elder statesmen who worked unprecedented miracles in the revolution and construction under the uplifted banner of Juche, the banner of Songun and built and strengthened a socialist power on the land of Korea.
					
					 Personages of Nepal, Mongolia, Sri Lanka, Thailand and Pakistan in their speeches praised the feats of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and proved the validity and vitality of the Juche idea, Songun idea.
					
					 They said that under the guidance of Kim Jong Un the service personnel and people of the DPRK are working world-startling miracles while frustrating every vicious offensive of the imperialists to stifle it by dint of powerful nuclear deterrence.
					
					 A letter to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the seminar.

articles.title: DPRK Delegation Leaves for India
articles.content:
DPRK FM Delegation Leaves for India
Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- A DPRK Foreign Ministry delegation led by Vice-Minister Ri Kil Song left here for India on Saturday.

articles.title: Kunja Revolutionary Site in DPRK Draws Many Visitors
articles.content:
Kunja Revolutionary Site in DPRK Draws Many Visitors
Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- The Kunja Revolutionary Site in the DPRK now draws many citizens with the 84th birthday of the Korean People's Army approaching.
					 The site is associated with the undying feats President Kim Il Sung performed by guiding the munitions production and laying a solid foundation for the nation's self-reliant defence industry during the 1950-1953 Fatherland Liberation War.
					
					 After Korea's liberation from Japan's colonial rule, Kim Il Sung gave top priority to the foundation of defence industry and saw to it that the country's first arsenal was built at Phyongchon-ri.
					
					 When the war broke out, he took a step to move the factory to an underground tunnel in Kunja-ri. Then he frequented this underground arsenal, inspiring its workers in the wartime production of weaponry and showing warm care of their living conditions.
					
					 He took measures to recall the factory's technicians from the front and arrange such welfare facilities as clinic, bathroom and club in the tunnel for the workers and even shared meals with them there.
					
					 Greatly encouraged by his deep trust and warm love, the Kunjari workers had sharply increased the output of weaponry, including 82mm mortars, submachine guns, bullets and hand grenades, in the spirit of devotedly defending the leader and the spirit of self-reliance and fortitude under the difficult conditions.
					
					 Today the DPRK is further consolidating the might of its Juche-based defence industry under the uplifted banner of self-development-first principle.

articles.title: DPRK's TV Drama "Bulletproof Wall" Wins Special Prize
articles.content:
DPRK's TV Drama "Bulletproof Wall" Wins Special Prize
Moscow, April 22 (KCNA Correspondent) -- TV drama "Bulletproof Wall" of the DPRK won a diploma of special prize at the 18th International Spy Film Festival held in Moscow.
					 More than 400 spy films of 57 countries including the DPRK, Mongolia, Iran, Australia and France were presented to the festival which opened on April 20.
					
					 The prize-giving ceremony took place at the building of the Social House of Russia on April 21. A diploma of special prize was conveyed to members of a DPRK film festival delegation.
					
					 Delegates of Austria, Kazakhstan and other countries and many delegates of TV broadcasting and film companies of Russia expressed their intention to air it on their TV channels, appreciating it as an excellent one unique and peculiar in its theme.
					
					 The stage of the TV drama is set against the background of the eve of the operation for Korea's liberation in the last period of the anti-Japanese armed struggle and years after the country's liberation. It makes a truthful artistic depiction of the tradition of devotedly defending the leader established by the anti-Japanese revolutionary forerunners and the noble mental spirit of patriots.

articles.title: Park Geun Hye's Hostile Remarks against DPRK Flailed
articles.content:
Park Geun Hye's Hostile Remarks against DPRK Flailed
Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- The leading newspapers of the DPRK on Saturday are critical of Park Geun Hye going about to reel off a torrent of hostile remarks against the DPRK again after her defeat in the "National Assembly" election of south Korea.
					 At the recent meeting of the chief secretaries of Chongwadae, Park pitched her voice high for "a stern punishment" and "full-ready military posture", slandering the DPRK's measure for bolstering up the nuclear deterrent for self-defence. She cried out for a "coordinated push" of the ruling and opposition parties, conservative and progressive forces to cope with the "sudden provocation" from the north.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun comments that this is a revelation of her intention to persist in the confrontation with the DPRK, far from making an apology for spoiling the inter-Korean relations and plunging the Korean peninsula into the brink of a nuclear war.
					
					 Such a disgraceful behavior of the evil woman who utters invectives to incite confrontation with the compatriots in the north, irrespective of time and circumstances, is nothing but a desperate fit of a psychopath, the newspaper says, and goes on:
					
					 If she is a woman of guilty conscience and elementary reasoning, she should fall prostrate and apologize for her crimes against the south Korean people and the nation and step down.
					
					 Her rhetoric only invites sneers from all people as she outlived her days.
					
					 It is advisable for Park to awake from a daydream of seizing power and have her shroud tailored for her funeral.
					
					 Minju Joson ridicules Park's rhetoric as a miserable funeral song of a top-class pro-U.S. lackey who is in great straits due to the dependence on outsiders.

articles.title: Those Forsaken by People Is Bound to Meet Ruin: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Those Forsaken by People Is Bound to Meet Ruin: Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- The 20th "National Assembly" election in south Korea was the one in which the criminals of history forsaken by people paid a due price for going against the people's demand, says Rodong Sinmun Saturday in a commentary.
					 The results of the election clearly showed the treacherous rulers once again that people's judgment is unrelenting and telling, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 Reactionary politics of those forsaken by people is bound to go bust without exception.
					
					 How to approach the people is a touchstone discerning whether the politics are popular or unpopular, progressive or reactionary.
					
					 The Park Geun Hye group of traitors which goes against the will and demand of the people, regarding them as only a plaything for attaining their sinister political purposes, paid a due price for its unpardonable politics of treachery this time.
					
					 The public is the best judge and no force on earth can defy it.
					
					 The group of traitors is making desperate efforts to get rid of its crisis, talking about "reshuffle of the party leadership and the Cabinet", a political trickery, but it will never be able to escape its ruin, being punished by the people.
					
					 The Park group's political doom is looming as it has committed unpardonable crimes against the nation.
					
					 It is certain that traitors going against the aspiration and demand of the popular masses are bound to meet the final destruction.

articles.title: S. Korean Regime Accused of Shutting down Kaesong Industrial Park
articles.content:
S. Korean Regime Accused of Shutting down Kaesong Industrial Park
Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- The south Korean emergency measure committee composed of representatives of the businesses involved in the Kaesong Industrial Park met on Wednesday to lodge a protest with the regime against shutting down the park.
					They accused the regime of abusing the basic right of the businesses.
					
					They declared they would take legal actions against the illegal step taken by the regime.

articles.title: S. Koreans Oppose Humiliating Agreement with Japan
articles.content:
S. Koreans Oppose Humiliating Agreement with Japan
Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- There was a department director-level talks between south Korea and Japan in Seoul Wednesday for implementing the humiliating "agreement" with Japan on the sexual slavery, according to the south Korean CBS.
					 The south Korean puppet ministry of Foreign Affairs was quoted as saying the talks discussed such follow-up measures as establishing a foundation for carrying out the "agreement".
					
					 South Koreans of various circles launched strong actions demanding the retraction of the humiliating "agreement."
					
					 The Park Geun Hye group of traitors is getting desperate to carry out the "agreement", turning a deaf ear to public criticism.

articles.title: Corruption of S. Korean Navy Officers Disclosed
articles.content:
Corruption of S. Korean Navy Officers Disclosed
Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- The corruption of the south Korean puppet military has invited international criticism.
					 Recently the German prosecution heavily fined a German company on charges of corruption, according to the south Korean KBS.
					
					 This company was known to have bribed high-ranking officers of the puppet navy of south Korea who were thinking of introducing German submarine.
					
					 The German prosecution has so far investigated the case since it was suspicious of corruption five years ago to ascertain it recently.
					
					 The high-ranking officers of the puppet forces introduced submarine with critical error in its capability by disguising them as the one of good performance in return for getting bribed by the company in 2008 and 2009.
					
					 The submarine is being called the one unable to submerge.

articles.title: Train Derailed in S. Korea
articles.content:
Train Derailed in S. Korea
Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- A train was derailed in Ryosu City, South Jolla Province, south Korea on Friday, leaving one engineman dead and several passengers wounded, according to the south Korean CBS.

articles.title: Japanese Reactionaries' Hostile Act against Koreans in Japan Denounced
articles.content:
Japanese Reactionaries' Hostile Act against Koreans in Japan Denounced
Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Federation of Koreans in the U.S. issued a statement on April 19 denouncing the hostile acts committed by the Japanese reactionaries against the Koreans in Japan.
					 The statement said that the ultra-right reactionary forces of Japan deliberately set afloat rumor and fostered bitterness toward the Koreans with the recent great quake in Kumamoto, Kyushu, Japan as an occasion.  This anachronistic act of fostering confrontation deserves condemnation, it noted.
					
					 It urged the Japanese government to ferret out those who spread the rumor and those who manipulated it behind the stage and apologize to the Koreans in Japan at once. It went on:
					
					 The Japanese government is resorting to provocative remarks and acts, far from uttering even a single word of apology for the crimes committed by Japan through history.
					
					 The Japanese government should immediately stop the campaign to persecute the Koreans in Japan and the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan by stirring up hostility toward the Koreans with the recent great quake as an occasion.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Lauded by Foreign Newspapers
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Lauded by Foreign Newspapers
Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- Foreign newspapers dedicated special write-ups to the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The April 1st-May 2nd issue of the Peruvian newspaper Accion Nacionalista carried an article titled "Kim Il Sung, great man of the century" illustrated with photos dealing with the exploits of the President and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The article said that human history does not know such a great man as the President who has been boundlessly revered by all people for centuries.
					
					 It noted that he was a veteran statesman in the world who led the cause of human independence under the uplifted banner of anti-imperialist independence all his life and a rarely great sage who impressed the world with his noble loving care and virtues.
					
					 The April 9th issue of the Thai Xing San Daily carried a special write-up illustrated with a portrait of the smiling President.
					
					 It introduced in detail his ideological, theoretical and leadership exploits and said that his sunny smile is full of faith and optimism about the rosy future of socialist Korea.
					
					 On the same day, the Syrian newspaper Tishrin in an article illustrated with his photo lauded him for working an unprecedented miracle by defeating the U.S. imperialists who boasted of being the "strongest" in the world and their followers in the 1950s.
					
					 The April 8th issue of the Guinean newspaper Horoya edited an article accompanied with a photo of his birth place in Mangyongdae.
					
					 It lauded Kim Il Sung as the greatest man of the 20th century, saying that he rendered the positive support to a lot of countries and people in their struggle for the national liberation against imperialism and building of a new society and made a great contribution to developing the non-aligned movement.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Brief Biography Posted by Chilean Organization on Its Website
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Brief Biography Posted by Chilean Organization on Its Website
Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- Brief biography of President Kim Il Sung was posted by the Chilean Branch of the Korean Friendship Association on its website on April 15, the Day of the Sun (the birth anniversary of the President).
					 Posted on the website was a portrait of smiling Kim Il Sung accompanied with the immortal revolutionary hymn "Song of General Kim Il Sung".

articles.title: Day of Sun Observed in Russia, China
articles.content:
Day of Sun Observed in Russia, China
Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- Events took place in Russia and China to celebrate the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun).
					 A ceremony of introducing Kimilsungia and Kimjongilia was held in Vladivostok, Russia, an opening ceremony of the book, photo and handicraft exhibition and film show at the Far East State Science Library, an opening ceremony of the book, photo, stamp and art exhibition in Beijing, China, a culture exhibition in Taian, Shandong Province and book, photo and art exhibitions in Shenyang and Dalian, Liaoning Province and Nanjing, Jiangsu Province between April 12 and 16.
					
					 On display at the venues of the events were photos dealing with the exploits of Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also displayed there were their works, and books dealing with their greatness, Kimilsungias and Kimjongilias in full bloom, books, photos and stamps introducing the army and people of the DPRK and art pieces associated with the wisdom and talents of the Korean people.
					
					 The Korean film "Grand Celebration of 70th Founding Anniversary of Workers' Party of Korea in Presence of Respected Comrade Kim Jong Un" was shown.
					
					 The participants laid floral baskets and bouquets before a portrait of the smiling great leaders and their photos and paid tribute to them.
					
					 The mayor of Khabarovsk City, Russia, the minister of Culture of the Khabarovsk Territory Administration and other speakers lauded Kim Il Sung as a veteran statesman in the world who made the immortal contributions to promoting the Korean people's well-being and developing the friendly relations between Russia and the DPRK.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Egypt
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Egypt
Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un's work "The Great Kim Il Sung Is the Eternal Leader of Our Party and Our People" was brought out in pamphlet by the Nath Publishing House of Egypt on April 13 on the occasion of the Day of the Sun, the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The work, published on April 20, Juche 101 (2012), deals with the revolutionary exploits performed by the President and leader Kim Jong Il all their lives.
					
					 It also indicates the tasks for firmly defending the idea and exploits of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and adding shine to them forever.

articles.title: Angolan Organization Supports Korean People's Just Cause
articles.content:
Angolan Organization Supports Korean People's Just Cause
Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- On the occasion of the 104th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun) the Angolan preparatory committee for celebrating the Day of the Sun released a statement on April 14.
					 The statement said:
					
					 The President founded the immortal Juche idea and wisely led the Korean people, making distinguished contribution to the socialist cause of the DPRK and the cause of human independence.
					
					 HE Kim Jong Un, supreme leader of the Korean people, is glorifying the revolutionary career and undying exploits of the President who dedicated his all to justice, truth and cause of human independence.
					
					 We are sure of greater success in the 70-day campaign the Korean people are launching to greet the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea with unprecedented labor feats.
					
					 We extend full support and solidarity to the just cause of the Korean people.

articles.title: Uruguayan Committee for Solidarity with DPRK Formed
articles.content:
Uruguayan Committee for Solidarity with DPRK Formed
Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- The Uruguayan Committee for Solidarity with the DPRK was inaugurated in Montevideo on April 15, birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Fernando Irigoyen was elected as chairman of the committee.
					
					 The chairman referred to the significance of the inauguration of the committee on the meaningful day, the 104th birth anniversary of the President.
					
					 He expressed the will of the committee to conduct brisk activities in support of the just cause of the Korean people, saying that the Korean people are fully demonstrating the heroic spirit as the staunchest fighters against imperialism under the leadership of the Workers' Party of Korea.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un dirige sobre terreno Central Hidroelectrica Heroes Jovenes Paektusan No.3
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un dirige sobre terreno Central Hidroelectrica Heroes Jovenes Paektusan No.3
Pyongyang, 23 de abril (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea dirigio sobre el terreno la Central Hidroelectrica Heroes Jovenes Paektusan No.3, construida magnificamente como regalo de fidelidad de los duenos de la Potencia de Juventud dirigido al VII Congreso del PTC.
					El Mariscal apreto las manos de cada uno de los miembros de mando alabando sus esfuerzos y dijo que los jovenes confiables del Paektu terminaron la obra en visperas del VII Congreso del PTC anticipando 4 meses la orden dada por el, asi que fue creado otra vez como en el ano pasado nuevo mito de juventud heroica en la tierra del Paektu donde se dio inicio a la revolucion del Juche.
					
					El Mariscal recorrio la exposicion de meritos de los heroes jovenes del monte Paektu.
					
					Presenciando uno tras otro de los datos exhibidos, el Mariscal dijo que al ver la Central Hidroelectrica Heroes Jovenes Paektusan recuerda por si solo al Dirigente Kim Jong Il y con el acabado de la construccion de la central No.3 se llego a materializar el legado del Dirigente y agrego con emocion que el se sentia satisfecho porque nuestros jovenes crecieron como heroes de la epoca y grandes hombres de creacion como deseaba el Dirigente antes de que se resolvio el problema de electricidad del distrito Samjiyon.
					
					Para presenciar la grandeza de la idea de nuestro Partido de dar importancia a la juventud y el futuro brillante de la Potencia de Juventud, basta con visitar la Central Hidroelectrica Heroes Jovenes Paektusan, dijo y agrego que esta central es la base productiva de electricidad y al mismo tiempo, es el centro de educacion que muestra con elocuencia la justeza y vitalidad de la idea de nuestro Partido de dar importancia a la juventud y el espiritu de epoca creado por nuestros jovenes.
					
					El Mariscal dijo que al levantarse el dique de la Central Hidroelectrica Heroes Jovenes Paektusan No. 1 aparecio un gran lago artificial en la zona del monte Paektu y lo denomino como "Lago de Heroes Jovenes del Paektu".
					
					El mariscal recorrio la Central Hidroelectrica Heroes Jovenes Paektusan No. 3.
					
					A construir durante un ano las centrales No.1, No.2 y No.3, los jovenes heroes formados firmemente bajo la direccion del Partido dieron punetazos duros de autofortalecimiento a los imperialistas yanquis y sus satelites enloquecidos por las sanciones y aplastamiento anti-RPDC.
					
					Durante la Marcha Penosa, la forzada, se crearon el espiritu revolucionario de los militares y el de Kanggye y en el presente periodo dificil, fue creado el espiritu de heroes jovenes Paektusan, lo cual comprueba elocuentemente la justeza de la direccion de los grandes Lideres y nuestro Partido que desde el primer periodo despues de la fundacion del Partido formaron a los jovenes como reservas, patrullas y  unidad de flanco del Partido conforme a la demanda de la revolucion en desarrollo de caracter prolongado, asevero.
					
					A traves de la conclusion de la Central Hidroelectrica Heroes Jovenes Paektusan, se probo de nuevo que la decision del Partido es precisamente la realidad y practica, y los jovenes coreanos desempenan un papel de vanguardia en materializar la decision del Partido y es muy potente el poderio de ellos, subrayo y continuo que el quiere encontrarse con todos ellos y encomendo a los miembros de mando transmitirles sus palabras de que ellos hicieron muchos  trabajos y tengan buena salud.
					
					El Mariscal Kim Jong Un exhorto a manifestar con vigor ante todo el mundo la indoblegable fuerza espiritual y el impetu de los jovenes coreanos al efectuar con solemnidad la ceremonia de inauguracion de la Central Hidroelectrica Heroes Jovenes Paektusan No.3 y dio directamente en el terreno la orden referente a la inauguracion y la mision combativa a ser cumplida por la Brigada de Choque Juventud Heroina del monte Paektu.
					
					El Mariscal fue acompanado por Choe Ryong Hae, secretario del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Ri Il Hwan, jefe de departamento del CC del PTC y Jo Yong Won, subjefe de departamento de CC de PTC.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe carta de participantes en seminario regional asiatico via Internet
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe carta de participantes en seminario regional asiatico via Internet
Pyongyang, 23 de abril (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un recibio una carta que le enviaran el dia 13 C. P. Mainali, secretario general del Comite Central del Partido Comunista (Marxista-Leninista), vicepremier y ministro de Mujeres, Ninos y Bienestar Social de Nepal, y Manju Ratna Sakya, subdirector general del Instituto Regional Asiatico de la Idea Juche y presidente de la Asociacion de Periodistas de Nepal, en representacion de los participantes en el seminario regional asiatico via Internet sobre la idea Juche.
					La misiva senala que los participantes en el presente foro alabaron las imborrables proezas del Presidente Kim Il Sung, la vida revolucionaria del Dirigente Kim Jong Il, la justeza y vitalidad de la idea Juche. 
					
					Afirma que en la historia humana estan registradas incontables hombres celebres, pero no hubo los grandes hombres como el Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il quienes reciben siglo tras siglo el respeto y veneracion del mundo entero. 
					
					Enfatiza que la idea revolucionaria y las indelebles hazanas de los grandes Lideres antecesores coreanos continuan satisfactoriamente por la sabia orientacion del Mariscal Kim Jong Un. 
					
					Expresa la conviccion de que gracias al Mariscal Kim Jong Un, el pueblo coreano creara nuevos milagros frustrando las maniobras de aislamiento, aplastamiento y bloqueo de EE.UU. y sus fuerzas satelites y acogera el VII Congreso del Partido del Trabajo de Corea como conclave de triunfadores.

articles.title: RPDC se incorporara a esfuerzos mundiales por alcanzar meta de desarrollo sostenido
articles.content:
RPDC se incorporara a esfuerzos mundiales por alcanzar meta de desarrollo sostenido
Pyongyang, 23 de abril (ACNC) -- El canciller de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Ri Su Yong, pronuncio un discurso en el seminario de alto nivel por el Alcance de la Meta de Desarrollo Sostenido, efectuado el dia 21 en la sede de la ONU.
					Ri menciono que el acuerdo sobre el desarrollo sostenido es el programa de accion comun de la humanidad que prometio eliminar a escala mundial la desigualdad social y la pobreza, desplegar a plenitud la dignidad y la facultad creativa del ser humano y construir el mundo que garantiza la vida rica no solo de nuestra generacion, sino tambien de otras venideras y continuo como lo siguiente:
					
					La RPDC ya expreso el apoyo a las metas del desarrollo sostenido, considerandolas convenientes a la politica por la construccion de un Estado prospero socialista.
					
					La RPDC, Estado socialista centrado en las masas populares, sirve totalmente al pueblo y se esfuerza mucho por asegurarle la vida mas acomodada y civilizada.
					
					El desarrollo sostenido en nuestro pais se realiza en condiciones pesimas debido a las fuerzas exteriores.
					
					Todos los esfuerzos del gobierno de la RPDC para eliminar la amenaza nuclear de los Estados Unidos realizados por medio el dialogo y la ley internacional fueron infructiferos.
					
					EE.UU. es precisamente el autor que empujo la RPDC a la posesion de armas nucleares y la amenaza y chantaje nucleares del imperio sirvieron de la fuerza motriz del fortalecimiento de las fuerzas armadas nucleares de la RPDC.
					
					La prueba de la bomba de hidrogeno de la RPDC deviene la medida de aseguramiento del autodefensivo disuasivo nuclear para defender la soberania del pais y el derecho a la subsistencia de la nacion, desde la agresiva politica hostil anti-RPDC y cada vez mas crecientes amenazas nucleares de EE.UU.
					
					El lanzamiento de nuestro satelite es el ejercicio de derecho legitimo del Estado soberano, reconocido internacionalmente.
					
					Si se considera como problema nuestra posesion nuclear frente a la amenaza nuclear de EE.UU., debera ser cuestionado EE.UU. que poseyo por primera vez y uso unicamente en el mundo las armas nucleares y si quiere acusar el lanzamiento de satelite de la RPDC deberan cuestionar todos los paises inclusive EE.UU. que lanzaron satelites al cosmos deberan ser cuestionados.
					
					Nuestro pueblo tiene su conviccion en la victoria y arrancara en algun tiempo indemnizacion merecida de EE.UU. que puso obstaculos en el desarrollo sostenido de la RPDC.
					
					El Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU que esta usandose por EE.UU. que obligo a la RPDC la guerra nuclear y sanciones y amenaza la paz y seguridad del mundo debe ser reformado sin demora sin convertirse en el juguete del imperio norteamericano.
					
					El canciller coreano urgio energicamente a EE.UU. cesar de inmediato todo tipo de amenazas nucleares y sanciones contra la RPDC y poner fin la anacronica politica hostil anti-RPDC.
					
					Y afirmo que la RPDC se incorporara activamente a los esfuerzos mundiales para alcanzar la meta del desarrollo sostenido, aun en medio de la severa situacion formulada en la Peninsula Coreana.
